Face masks are now required in all stations and onboard all public transport vehicles due to health and safety guidelines. Please follow the latest health advisories.
New contactless payment systems will be installed across all stations starting next week! You can now link your card for faster check-ins and more convenient travel.
In preparation for the City Parade on October 1, certain routes may experience delays or diversions. Use the app’s real-time tracker to stay updated on bus and train availability.
Due to road repairs, Bus Route 12 will follow an alternate path. Please check the map for the new drop-off points along Park Avenue.
Train services on the Eastbound Line will be temporarily suspended from 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM tomorrow due to emergency maintenance. Bus alternatives will be provided during this period.
Heavy rains are expected to affect transportation services starting from 3:00 PM today. Please anticipate possible delays or service disruptions , especially in flood-prone areas.
Due to ongoing maintenance on the Central Line, expect delays between 9:00 PM to 5:00 AM from September 21-23. Please plan your trip accordingly. Alternative routes via South Station are available.
LRT-1 to suspend operations for 3 weekends this month

We envision a future where transportation is accessible and efficient. By harnessing the latest technology, we aim to simplify your daily commute, improve urban mobility, and help reduce congestion. We believe that through innovative tools like real-time arrival trackers and transit pass management, we can build smarter cities for everyone.
Cash-in Options: Easily top-up your transportation cards from the convenience of your device.
Real-Time Arrival Tracker: Stay updated on bus and train arrival times, ensuring you never miss a ride.
Crowdedness Tracker: Know how busy your train or bus will be before boarding.
Transportation Discounts: Access exclusive discounts with transit access passes, saving you money on every ride.
Announcements: Stay updated on delays, route changes, and important notices in real-time.
Drop-off Station Notifications: Set reminders for your stop, so you’ll never miss your destination again.
Loans for Transit Passes: We provide accessible loan options to help you manage your commute costs easily.

Whether you are a daily commuter or an occasional traveler, SEAT is committed to providing a stress-free and reliable transit experience. Our cutting-edge platform is designed with you in mind, ensuring that getting from point A to point B is as easy and hassle-free as possible.
OPTIONAL: Enter your email for the official receipt
You will reach Carriedo in approximately 3 mins
Where can I buy the SEAT Card?
Where can I buy the SEAT Card? ˄
Where can I buy the SEAT Card? ˅
Can I top up using my bank? ˅
Can I top up using my bank? ˄
What happens if I lose the card? ˄
What happens if I lose the card? ˅
You can purchase the SEAT Card at train stations, subject to availability. It is also available at select convenience stores and malls for your convenience.
Yes, you can link your SEAT Card to your bank account or mobile wallet for easy top-ups and payments.

If you lose your SEAT Card, please report it immediately through the app or contact customer support. Your card will be deactivated to prevent unauthorized use, and you can request a replacement card to restore access to your balance and services.
Thank you for reaching out! We\'ve received your concern and are reviewing it. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
